synopsis.text:
Think twice before committing heinous acts, for the Judge of Darkness is watching. By day, Hoichiro Ohma is a seemingly ordinary office worker, with a loving girlfriend named Nanase who remains oblivious to his true identity. However, when the shadows of the night fall and the unjust escape earthly justice, Ohma transforms into the Judge of Darkness, wielding a book made of human skin and accompanied by an uncanny parrot.

The Judge of Darkness serves as the enforcer of the Laws of Darkness, where the wronged spirits seek retribution against their living offenders. As the Judge delves deeper into a high-profile corporate embezzlement and murder case, he uncovers a web of corruption that reaches the highest echelons of the corporate world. With the assistance of the Demons of Hell, the Judge of Darkness works tirelessly to ensure that even the dead receive the justice they deserve. Will the guilty be able to escape the Judge's unyielding pursuit, or will they finally face the consequences of their actions?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
